channel.title: CVE Feed for SourceCodester -- Zoo Management System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SourceCodester -- Zoo Management System

item.title: CVE-2022-2803|2024-08-03T00:52:58.734Z -- sourcecodester -- zoo%20management%20system
item.description: A vulnerability was found in SourceCodester Zoo Management System and classified as critical. This issue affects some unknown processing of the file /pages/animals.php. The manipulation of the argument class_id leads to sql injection. The attack may be initiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. The identifier VDB-206249 was assigned to this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-2804|2024-08-03T00:52:58.663Z -- sourcecodester -- zoo%20management%20system
item.description: A vulnerability was found in SourceCodester Zoo Management System. It has been classified as critical. Affected is an unknown function of the file /pages/apply_vacancy.php. The manipulation of the argument filename leads to unrestricted upload. It is possible to launch the attack remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. VDB-206250 is the identifier assigned to this vulnerability.
